"......<%me>": "This is fortuitous. I needed to express my appreciation in person."
"Thank you for correcting our... no, *my* grave error."
"And at the same time, an apology. You bore no wrong, and yet, you were hunted as a criminal..."
"At a time when we need to be more united than ever, your allies were turned against you. From the bottom of my heart, please forgive me."
"I accept complete responsibility for the recent events. Once matters settle down, I plan to answer for my actions in a way that will satisfy all."
"And you think simply sacrificing yourself makes up for all that? Sorry pops, you're not getting off that easy."
"If the leader does not take responsibility, the organization will crumble. I cannot allow ARKS to--"
"No, no. That way of thinking is ancient, outdated. <%me>, don't you agree?"
"The emergency broadcast, the use of AVIS, all of it was to appear as if you made the decision alone, am I right?"
"There's nothing I can't stand more than a person who tries to take the fall alone."
"...pray tell, what do you propose? I am a veteran who knows little more than how to wage war."
"Accepting responsibility for your actions isn't just accepting punishment. Start by reflecting on how to atone for what's been done."
"If you really still don't understand, then... I know."
"Work your ass off so hard for the organization that you'd wish you were dead. Only after that can you think about kicking the bucket."
"If you disappeared now, it would cause even worse repercussions than the alternative. Don't you see?"
